name: Omega
description: A specialist ship of Pharmakon Faction.. When out of phase it activates its trump card OMEGAAAA BEAAAAMMMMMM. That obliterates its enemies.
obtaining: You can obtain its blueprint by attacking Pharmakon Phlash Cargo in the Pharmakon Sector.
tips-builds: You can use the usual build which is using Traidic Vulcan as a weapon.. or you can use Binary torpedoes. Spectral or Shockwave Screen can be use.. Also use harmonic thrusters..
author: Useless Sonanochi
